components.title: Alert
components.summary: An alert displays important messages, feedback, or time-sensitive information.

components.title: Badge
components.summary: A compact visual indicator for status, counts and notifications.

components.title: Blur
components.summary: The Blur component is used to apply a blur effect over content, often used to obscure sensitive or background information.

components.title: Breadcrumbs
components.summary: A breadcrumb is a secondary navigation showing the website hierarchy.

components.title: Button
components.summary: A button can be tapped or clicked to perform an action.

components.title: Calendar
components.summary: The calendar displays a grid of selectable dates.

components.title: Card
components.summary: The card groups related content into a single container.

components.title: Checkbox
components.summary: A checkbox is a form element that allows users to select one or multiple options.

components.title: Coachmark
components.summary: Coachmarks guide users through interface features.

components.title: Context menu
components.summary: A context menu displays a list of contextual actions.

components.title: Datepicker
components.summary: ⁠The datepicker allows users to select a date.

components.title: Details
components.summary: The details component is a collapsible section that helps organize and hide content until needed.

components.title: Dialog
components.summary: ⁠A dialog appears in front of content to provide critical information or ask for a decision.

components.title: Div
components.summary: Div is a base element in the declarative layout system.

components.title: Divider
components.summary: Divider creates visual and semantic separation between content.

components.title: Dropdown
components.summary: A dropdown enables the user to choose one or multiple options from a list.

components.title: FAB
components.summary: Floating action button persists across screens for constant access to features that needs to be accessible at all times.

components.title: Filter chips
components.summary: Filter chips allow users to narrow down the data they want to see on the page.

components.title: Form summary
components.summary: Form summary shows all form errors in one place.

components.title: Grid
components.summary: The grid is a custom element that provides a flexible grid system.

components.title: Icon
components.summary: An icon helps communicate meaning quickly, enhances visual hierarchy, and supports navigation or interaction.

components.title: Image
components.summary: An image displays media with configurable dimensions and styling properties.

components.title: Input
components.summary: An input lets users enter and edit text or numerical values in forms.

components.title: Link
components.summary: A link navigates users to other pages or sections of content.

components.title: Menu button
components.summary: A menu button combines button and link behaviors for navigation menus.

components.title: Popover
components.summary: A popover is a temporary view that appears above other content.

components.title: Radio
components.summary: A radio button is a form element that allows users to select one of the predefined set of choices.

components.title: Rich text
components.summary: Rich text can be used to wrap generic HTML content and apply typography styles.

components.title: Segmented control
components.summary: Segmented control allows users to select a single option, immediately changing the display to reflect their selection. It is used for switching views or view options, not for navigation.

components.title: Select
components.summary: A select enables the user to choose one or multiple options from a list.

components.title: Signal
components.summary: A signal draws attention to notifications and new content.

components.title: Text
components.summary: Text summary

components.title: Textarea
components.summary: Textarea allow users to input text and digits on multiple lines.

components.title: Theme
components.summary: Theme summary

components.title: Video
components.summary: Video summary
